remarks: The direct product of a collection of direct products.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dprd2d.1 $e |- ( ph -> Rel A ) $.
dprd2d.2 $e |- ( ph -> S : A --> ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
dprd2d.3 $e |- ( ph -> dom A C_ I ) $.
dprd2d.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. I ) -> G dom DProd ( j e. ( A " { i } ) |-> ( i S j ) ) ) $.
dprd2d.5 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd ( i e. I |-> ( G DProd ( j e. ( A " { i } ) |-> ( i S j ) ) ) ) ) $.
dprd2d.k $e |- K = ( mrCls ` ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
dprd2db $p |- ( ph -> ( G DProd S ) = ( G DProd ( i e. I |-> ( G DProd ( j e. ( A " { i } ) |-> ( i S j ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A i j $.
$d G i j $.
$d I i $.
$d K i $.
$d S i j $.
$d i j ph $.
